英文法規名稱: Regulations for Awards for Radioactive Materials Research and Development
中文法規名稱: 放射性物料研究發展獎勵辦法
沿革內容:
1.Enforced by letter HWZ No.0930047669 on December 29, 2004
2.Amendment of Articles 2 and 3 on May 18, 2018 by the Atomic Energy Council per its decree No. Hui-Wu-Tzu-10700060001

法規內容.條文內容: The Regulations are enacted to paragraph 2, article 46 of the Nuclear Materials and Radioactive Waste Management Act.

Related persons or organizations which implement on research and development on the radioactive materials operational and final disposal technologies shall be recommended as candidates for the Awards for Radioactive Materials Research and Development if one of the following achievements has been reached.
1. Implementing researching and developing projects, of which the achievements greatly improved or enhanced the present radioactive materials operational and final disposal technologies.
2. Implementing researching and developing projects, of which the achievements contribute greatly to promoting the management safety of the radioactive materials and final disposals.
3. Contributing greatly to planning or providing specific suggestions for the research and development of the radioactive materials management technologies and final disposals.

The activity of Awards under the provisions of the preceding article shall be carried out once every two years. The competent authority accepts recommendations from June 1st to July 31 of the current year in which the awards be handled.

Written recommendations for recommending candidates shall be enclosed and submitted to the competent authority.
Format of the written recommendation referred to in the previous paragraph shall be prescribed further by the competent authority.
The evaluation of the competent authority consists of the first and the final review.
The competent authority shall establish a first review team, which shall provide the list of qualified candidates after paper evaluation.
The competent authority shall invite scholars and specialists to form the final review committee, which shall review the qualified candidates list and hold meeting or make interviews if necessary.

Persons or organizations ratified for the awards by the competent authority will be awarded and commended in public on the chosen date.
The awards and public commendation referred to in the previous paragraph shall be combined with other encouraging activities of the competent authority.
These regulations shall come into force as of the date of promulgation.
